title: ESA Publishes Call for Reusable Rocket Booster Concepts
summary:
The European Space Agency has published a call for reusable rocket booster concept proposals that will allow Europe to develop “the necessary reusable transportation systems to achieve routine access to space.” The Boosters for European Space Transportation (BEST!) initiative is being managed by ESA’s Space Transportation Directorate under its Future Launcher Preparatory Programme (FLPP). According […]
The post ESA Publishes Call for Reusable Rocket Booster Concepts appeared first on European Spaceflight.

title: Greece signs Artemis Accords
summary: Greece became the latest country to sign the Artemis Accords outlining best practices for sustainable space exploration Feb. 9.
